content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5) - working
- Boiler (position: -6.0, 1.5) - refueled with coal (11 remaining)
- Steam engine (position: -1.5, 4.5) - working
- Connected with pipes between offshore pump and boiler (3 pipes) and boiler to steam engine (4 pipes)

### Iron Production Line at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore - chest full warning
- Wooden chest (position: 15.5, 72.5) for ore storage - contains 61 iron ore
- Inserter (position: 16.5, 72.5) - fixed orientation, now working
- Stone furnace (position: 16.0, 74.0) smelting iron ore to plates - contains 43 iron plates
- Inserter (position: 17.5, 74.5) - output blocked warning
- Inserter (position: 18.5, 74.5) - waiting for source items
- Assembling machine 2 (position: 21.5, 74.5) set to produce iron gear wheels - missing iron plates
- Output chest (position: 19.5, 74.5) - empty
- Small electric poles providing power coverage

## ERROR TIPS

### Repeated placement errors (4 new instances)
- Attempting to place entities where they already exist: Always check for existing entities before placement (occurred 9 times total with electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5))
- Placement in water/unbuildable terrain: Verify terrain is suitable before placing mining drills (occurred at (48.5,50.5) and (98.5,100.5))
- Placement distance too far: Move within 10 tiles of target position before placing (distance was 16.40 tiles for inserter at (17.5,74.5))

### Production chain issues
- Full output chest stopping mining: Empty the chest at (15.5,72.5) (now contains 61 iron ore) to resume mining
- Assembler missing resources: Connect iron plate supply to assembling machine at (21.5,74.5)
- Inserter output blocked: Verify output path for inserter at (17.5,74.5) is clear

### Optimization opportunities
- Iron plate accumulation: 43 plates in furnace not being utilized
- Gear wheel production stalled: Address missing plate supply to assembler
- Throughput imbalance: Current iron ore production at 42/min, plate production at 10/min

### Power management
- Boiler fuel monitoring: 11 coal remaining in boiler - implement automated delivery
- Electrical coverage: All production buildings remain properly powered
